name.baseName: Production of aluminum electrolytic capacitors ; Cathodes for aluminum electrolysis ; Cathode foil slitting ; Aluminum coils of 0.05 mm cathode-etched aluminum foil
铝电解电容器生产 ; 铝电解用阴极 ; 阴极箔分切 ; 0.05 mm阴极蚀刻铝箔的铝线圈

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 阴极箔分切 ; 铝电解电容器 (AEC) 生产 ; 420V 680uf

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The investigated manufacturer produced about 1.183 billion AECs of all kinds in 2020.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process involves the production of aluminum electrolytic capacitors, specifically the creation of the cathodes used in aluminum electrolysis. The process includes slitting cathode foil and manufacturing aluminum coils with 0.05 mm cathode-etched aluminum foil. These components are crucial for fabricating 420V 680uf capacitor units, which are utilized in various electronics for energy storage and filtering. The capacitors produced are suitable for a wide range of applications that require durable and reliable electronic components.
所描述的工业过程涉及铝电解电容器的生产，特别是用于铝电解的阴极的创建。该过程包括切割阴极箔和制造铝线圈，其具有0.05毫米蚀刻阴极的铝箔。这些组件对于制造420V 680uf电容器单元至关重要，这些电容器单元被广泛用于电子产品中，用于能量存储和滤波。生产出的电容器适用于需要耐用且可靠的电子组件的各种应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of capacitor production come from the AECs’ production factory in Jiangsu Province, China. The cut-off criteria of LCI data collection for each process is coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. The inventory data of anode foil production and cathode foil production is obtained based on the analysis of the manufacturing processes and corresponding process parameters. The upstream data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi software (Version: 10.6.1.35). In detail, the profile of Chineses electricity grid from the China Electric Power Yearbook adopts the reference year 2016. The reference year of aluminum ingot production is 2015. The inaccessible data about ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3 are estimated based on chemical equations using the existing materials (reactants) in the Gabi software. The use and end-of-life stage inventory data are obtained based on analysis and calculation.

电容器生产的库存数据来自 AEC 位于中国江苏省的生产工厂。每道工序的 LCI 数据收集的截止标准是至少覆盖输入流和输出流 95% 的质量和能量。阳极箔生产和阴极箔生产的库存数据是根据生产工艺和相应工艺参数分析获得的。上游数据（即铝锭、分选纸、运输、电力和水）来自 Gabi 软件（版本：10.6.1.35）。具体而言，《中国电力年鉴》中的中国电网概况以 2016 年为基准年。铝锭生产的基准年为 2015 年。无法获取的柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、NH4H2PO4 和 HBO3 数据是根据 Gabi 软件中现有材料（反应物）的化学方程式估算的。使用和报废阶段的库存数据是通过分析和计算获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).
Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the provided Life Cycle Inventory (LCI) data relevant to aluminum electrolytic capacitor production, it is essential to observe the specified cut-off criteria, ensuring coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. Data users should be aware that the reference years for the electricity grid and aluminum ingot production are 2016 and 2015, respectively. For elements like ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3, where data is inaccessible, users should apply estimations based on chemical equations using reactants available within the Gabi software. Data on use and end-of-life stages are derived from analysis and calculation and should be applied accordingly during LCA studies.

在使用与铝电解电容器生产相关的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，必须遵守指定的截止标准，确保至少覆盖95％的投入和产出流的质量和能量。数据用户应该知道，电网和铝锭生产的参考年分别是2016年和2015年。对于像柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、磷酸二氢铵和硼酸这样数据无法获取的元素，用户应使用Gabi软件中可用的反应物基于化学方程式进行估算。使用和产品寿命终端阶段的数据来源于分析和计算，应在生命周期评估研究中相应应用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Al coil of 0.05mm cathode etched foil
